name: Little Planet - Early Access
summary: Experience the wonder of Little Planet, a life-simulation VR game, where your new life begins. Dive into an ever-growing fantasy world, decorate your surroundings, manage inventory, and interact with funny inhabitants. Embrace serenity and escape the daily hustle in this immersive experience. Little Planet awaits your arrival for an adventure of a lifetime. Welcome to your new beginning in the virtual universe.
